review: I could see the value in this, if it worked. I bought this as part of my plan to disconnect from twc, directv, etc to pick up a few shows not available on hulu and netflix. The picture quality is good, but the "cast" disconnects after only a few minutes. So it's impossible to watch shows. The online troubleshooting guide boils down to, "we know it doesn't work, hopefully it will work soon."

review: This device is awesome, works well when you're in the confines of the apps. The only problems I have are that is needs an internet connection to work and doesn't work with amazon prime videos. Hopefully they'll be a fix for that soon. Otherwise is a great little portable media streamer. (For those of you on campus, use your laptop to create a wifi network that only you have the password for, that way you don't need to worry about other people getting to it. Remember to share you internet connection with it, otherwise it can't update and won't stream.)

review: I purchased this because my smart dvd player broke down. My kods love Netflix and I watch lengthy youtube videos at times. Both my kids have tablet (a nabi and a Kindle) I have activated the safety locks and now they both can watch thier movies on the main tv when they want. I save money on the major cable channels which I wasn't watching much anyway. Its a win win.
